text: Monument, Kensal Green Cemetery General Henry Joseph Pelly (9 January 1818 - 10 December 1891) was a British Army officer and a general in the Indian Army's Bombay Staff Corps. Henry Joseph Pelly was born on 9 January 1818, the son of John Hinde Pelly and Elizabeth Lewis. He was promoted to general on 1 October 1877. He was buried at Kensal Green Cemetery. ==References== Category:1818 births Category:1891 deaths Category:Burials at Kensal Green Cemetery
title: Henry Joseph Pelly
